sources.title: Sleep, My Love (1948)
sources.description: A woman wakes up in the middle of the night on board a train, but she can't remember how she got there. Danger and suspense ensue. Watch on RetroFlix.org: https://retroflix.org/sleep-my-love-1948/

sources.title: Sleep, My Love
sources.description: Title: Sleep, My Love Summary: Alison Courtland wakes up in the middle of the night on board a train, but she cannot remember how she got there. Danger and suspense ensue. Directed by: Douglas Sirk Actors: Claudette Colbert, Robert Cummings, Don Ameche Production Company: Triangle Productions Release Date: 16 March 1948 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Alison Courtland wakes up in the middle of the night on board a train, but she cannot remember how she got there. Danger and suspense ensue.

metadata.Plot: Alison Courtland wakes up in the middle of the night on board a train, but she cannot remember how she got there. Danger and suspense ensue.
metadata.Writer: St. Clair McKelway, Leo Rosten, Decla Dunning
